Articles.Content:
Hi,

Welcome to my first thread,

This thread is for planes that are designed and look like the jets from the cold war

A mod that has some good parts that may help is the FireSpitter parts by Snjo

For missiles I would also recommend that you use the Lazor Systems Lazor guided weapons mod. ( To use this mod you need the lazor mod )

Both are available on the Kerbal Spaceport

If you are using mods ( Which I highly recommend you do:)) please put in the post which mods they are and the parts if possible (Dont worry if you are not sure)

I do not have B9 and the mod crashes my laptop, so I may have to ask somebody to test the aircraft for me.

I will hopefully be able to put a thread on the Spacecraft Exchange at somepoint if there is interest

I cannot guarantee that I will be able to be on here all the time and I may be a on off the forums due to schoolwork

Keep Building,

Welcome to the forums, however this doesn't seem to be a challenge.

The Spacecraft Exchange has had threads with similar topics, you should be able to dig up some with the search function.

Please read the Challenge Submission Guide if you wish to post a challenge, once you have the challenge properly laid out feel free to make a new thread.

Thread locked.
